status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
The result from my ad 2.0 AB testing shows that the main payment page conversion gap comes from the less engagement on edit ad journey, which also one of the key journeys leading to the payment page. Therefore, we want to enhance the design to assure on par or better edit ad engagement. We will update our design to enhance edit ad path. 

*+Mock-up+*
* Mobile design 1 - https://zpl.io/aM5O8wr
* Mobile design 2 - https://zpl.io/2jkLEep
* Desktop design 1 - https://zpl.io/2GpKMDW
* Desktop design 2 - https://zpl.io/b6QkReq

*+AB testing set-up+*
* Control - RUI
* Variation 1 - 2.0 design with desktop/ mobile variation 1 which edit ad CTA is on the left hand side
* Variation 2 - 2.0 design with desktop/ mobile variation 2 which edit ad CTA is on the right hand side

*+Problems suspected+*
* MyAd 1.0 call to actions are located in the same area on the page while MyAd 2.0 has feature list on the right-hand side, edit and delete on the left-hand side and payment button on the bottom of the page.
* MyAd 2.0 "Edit Ad" looks more like texts than button so less call to action tone.

*+MyAds 2.0 ZA AB Testing Analysis+*
https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1WUWiPIOqYMTTydl2Fmb4rXZd1FvJnQYxoLNwba5C1SU/edit

comments.body: [~yuanhuang] designs of both variations are now ready.

[~jerome][~qblanchais]I found the mobile design does not exist, and for desktop, only found it on ZA desktop, what's should we do for MX ?
I have two question regarding the development: 
Firstly, we have both handlerbar / marko implementation of my ads, in the long run, we are going to migrate with marko, so are you guys agree we only update the marko version ?
Secondly, for my ads page, no matter it's handlerbar or marko, ZA and MX shared the same template, so it's will save development effort if we have similar design for both site, so I wonder if we can design that for both site ?

[~justin] My bad, I didnt share the link for the screen called Variation 2 for mobile ZA. Please find it here: zpl.io/2jkLEep
Regarding MX, I believe only the colors are different but I you need a mockup I will make one.
Move to next sprint due to shortage of bandwidth.

dev 2 points

qa: manual 2 points + 1 automation point

items.fromString: My ad 2.0 - edit ad design enhancement
items.toString: My ad 2.0 - edit ad CTA design enhancement

items.fromString:
The result from my ad 2.0 AB testing shows that the main payment page conversion gap comes from the less engagement on edit ad journey, which also one of the key journeys leading to the payment page. Therefore, we want to enhance the design to assure on par or better edit ad engagement. We will update our design to enhance edit ad path. 

*+Mock-up+*
* Desktop - 
* Mobile - 

*+Problems suspected+*
* MyAd 1.0 call to actions are located in the same area on the page while MyAd 2.0 has feature list on the right-hand side, edit and delete on the left-hand side and payment button on the bottom of the page.
* MyAd 2.0 "Edit Ad" looks more like texts than button so less call to action tone.

*+MyAds 2.0 ZA AB Testing Analysis+*
https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1WUWiPIOqYMTTydl2Fmb4rXZd1FvJnQYxoLNwba5C1SU/edit
